member.name: M:HappyTravel.Edo.Api.Infrastructure.SupplierConnectors.ConnectorClient.ExecuteWithRetryOnUnauthorized(System.Func{System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Method covers two situations: 1. EDO has invalid token that is expired or belongs to old instance of Identity server (Identity and connectors were restarted but EDO did not) 2. EDO has valid token and connectors have invalid information about an Identity server certificate (Identity and EDO were restarted but connector did not)
